channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Walking Pad is 30% Off With This Cyber Week Sale
item.description: The Urevo CyberPad for Home is an extremely capable walking pad with a 14 percent incline. It's now well under $500.

item.title: The Rocco Fridge Isn't So Smart, But It Sure Is Pretty
item.description: What the Rocco fridge lacks in smarts, it makes up for in looks. You have a few hours left to save on the brand's Black Friday sale.

item.title: Stock Up On Lifestraw Personal Water Filters During This Sale
item.description: WIRED readers are weirdly obsessed with this backpacking water filter. It's cheap, and it's yours.

item.title: 20 Best Black Friday TV Deals (2025)
item.description: Here are the best deals on screens from Hisense, TCL, Samsung, Sony, and more this shopping holiday.

item.title: This Alienware Laptop Is the Best Gaming Laptop Deal Going Right Now
item.description: Finding a cheap gaming laptop that doesn't suck ain't easy. But I found it.

item.title: Black Friday sets online spending record of $11.8B, Adobe says
item.description: American consumers spent $11.8 billion online on Black Friday, according to data from Adobe Analytics, which says it tracks more than 1 trillion visit...

item.title: Airbus orders software fix to thousands of planes due to solar radiation risk
item.description: The company said it’s taking action because “analysis of a recent event involving an A320 Family aircraft has revealed that intense solar radiation ma...

item.title: New York state law takes aim at personalized pricing
item.description: Businesses that use personalized pricing are now required to tell customers, “This price was set by an algorithm using your personal data."

item.title: VC Kara Nortman bet early on women’s sports, and now she’s creating the market
item.description: As women's sports enters what feels like a sustained boom period -- the Golden State Valkyries just played their first WNBA next season, the NWSL is e...

item.title: No, you can’t get your AI to ‘admit’ to being sexist, but it probably is anyway
item.description: Though LLMs might not use explicitly biased language, they may infer your demographic data and display implicit biases, researchers say.
